description:
Cozy studio apartment in Harlem. Complete with closet space, Queen size bed and two optional inflatable mattress, microwave, pots and pans, plates and silverware, convenient places to eat, lots of culture to take in and very close to the 2,3,4,5 and 6 train.

The whole Apartment

The 2 and 5 train are just a few blocks away in West 135th Street. The 5 and 6 train are conveniently located on 135th and Lexington Ave
name: Cozy studio apartment in upper Manhattan
review:
Oscar was the best host i've ever stumbled upon. Kept contact Every now and then to make sure everything was great.
Great apartment, perfect size for 2-3 persons. Every essentials is already in the apartment.
